header.title: Find the best sports venues near you
header.subtitle: Gather your team, discover new venues and experience sports like never before. Sport-App connects you to your passion, wherever you are.
header.cta: Get notified of the app release

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle_localisation: Easily locate places to practice your sport
features.subtitle_sport: Practicing a rare sport? Add it to the app
features.subtitle_share: Photos, videos, comments: build a real community
features.subtitle_social: Like, follow, and chat with other enthusiasts

newsletter.title: Be the first to know
newsletter.subtitle: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest updates from Sport-App.

questions.apps: Will there be an Android/iOS app?

metadata.title: Sport-App - Find Sports Venues Near You
metadata.description: Discover and book the best sports venues in your area. Connect with other players and organize games easily with Sport-App.
